queryParameters.name: User
queryParameters.description: matches fname, lname, or organization containing the parameter

queryParameters.name: Include
queryParameters.description: we can include any one of the following fields ie,outstanding_balance,credit_balance,draft_balance,overdue_balance,grand_total_balance,last_activity,late_reminders,late_fee

queryParameters.name: category
queryParameters.description: category containing the parameter

queryParameters.name: Cost of goods sold
queryParameters.description: Search by true/false cost of goods sold

queryParameters.name: Include
queryParameters.description: we can include any one of the following fields ie,category,expense_profile,project,account

queryParameters.name: Cost of goods sold
queryParameters.description: Search by true/false cost of goods sold

queryParameters.name: Include
queryParameters.description: we can include any one of the following fields ie,expense_usage_all_time,expense_usage_this_year

queryParameters.name: Include Logged Duration
queryParameters.description: true returns the time logged for a project (in seconds)

queryParameters.name: Minimum date
queryParameters.description: Search by date greater than or equal

queryParameters.name: Maximum date
queryParameters.description: Search by date less than or equal

queryParameters.name: Minimum amount
queryParameters.description: Search by amount greater than parameter

queryParameters.name: Maximum amount
queryParameters.description: Search by amount greater than parameter

queryParameters.name: PO number
queryParameters.description: Search by Po number containing parameter

queryParameters.name: Outstanding
queryParameters.description: Search by outstanding or not outstanding invoices

queryParameters.name: Minimum updated date
queryParameters.description: Search by updated date greater than or equal to parameter

queryParameters.name: Maximum updated date
queryParameters.description: Search by updated date less than parameter

queryParameters.name: Minimum Oustanding amount
queryParameters.description: Search with an outstanding amount greater than input

queryParameters.name: Include
queryParameters.description: we can include any one of the following fields ie,audit_logs,client_audits,comments,contacts,direct_links,lines,latest_journal_entry,allowed_gateways,late_fee,presentation,late_reminders,owner,system

queryParameters.description: Search by date less than or equal

queryParameters.description: Search by amount greater than parameter

queryParameters.description: Search by amount less than parameter

queryParameters.name: Include

queryParameters.description: Search by date greater than or equal

queryParameters.description: Search by date less than parameter

queryParameters.description: Search by amount greater than parameter

queryParameters.name: Credit
queryParameters.description: Search payment converted from credit or not

queryParameters.name: Payment or Credit
queryParameters.description: invoice returns payments, credit returns credits

queryParameters.name: Include
queryParameters.description: we can include any one of the following fields ie,client,invoice,credit_note,order,gateway

queryParameters.name: User details
queryParameters.description: searches staff with lname, fname, or organization containing parameter

queryParameters.name: Include
queryParameters.description: we can include projectids

queryParameters.name: Type of user
queryParameters.description: true returns compound taxes, false returns non-compound taxes

queryParameters.name: Minimum updated date
queryParameters.description: Search by updated date greater than or equal to parameter

queryParameters.name: Maximum updated date
queryParameters.description: Search by updated date less than parameter

queryParameters.name: Billabe
queryParameters.description: true returns entries that can be automatically added to an invoice

queryParameters.name: Updated Since
queryParameters.description: matches entries that have been updated at or after the specified utc date/time
